pages.text: Hive bees, like the vanilla bee, lives in hives and produce honey and resources. They have to live in advanced hives to produce resource combs. Most hive bees are bred from solitary bees and other hive bees but some are made by giving a specific item to a bee. All bee recipes can be found in JEI.

Each hive bee has it's own particular flower need in order to produce resources. For instance, an Iron Bee needs something made of iron nearby it's hive. All flowering requirements can be found with JEI.

pages.title: Iron Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/solitary_bees#ashy_mining)Ashy Mining Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Gold Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/solitary_bees#mason)Mason Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Redstone Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#glowing)Glowing Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/solitary_bees#chocolate_mining)Chocolate Mining Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Lapis Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/hive_bees#redstone)Redstone Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#blue_banded)Blue Banded Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Coal Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/hive_bees#redstone)Blazing Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#leafcutter)Leafcutter Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Obsidian Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#magmatic)Magmatic Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#sweaty)Sweat Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Diamond Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/wild_bees#ender)Ender Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/hive_bees#lapis)Lapis Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Emerald Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/wild_bees#slimy)Slimy Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/hive_bees#diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Skeletal Bee
pages.text: Will move in to an advanced hive if the hive is left empty in the dark.

pages.title: Zombie Bee
pages.text: Will move in to an advanced hive if the hive is left empty in the dark.

pages.title: Creeper Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding a block of TNT to a vanilla bee.

pages.title: Blazing Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#magmatic)Magmatic Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#nomad)Nomad Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Withered Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding a wither rose to a $(l:bees/hive_bees#skeletal)Skeletal Bee$(/l).
